articles.title: Worcester Warriors: Steve Diamond warns club are in 'dire position' but owners still hope for new investment - BBC
articles.description: Worcester Warriors director of rugby Steve Diamond says that, although the owners are still hoping to be rescued by new investment, the club's position remains "dire".
articles.content:
